nodes.text: Unit 26 was a BX-series droid commando who participated in the Battle of the Rishi moon.

The droid dressed up in clone trooper armor in an attempt to fool Captain Rex and Commander Cody and convince them to leave the station. When the two witnessed a droid attack flare, Rex realized that they were being received by a droid and immediately shot Unit 26 in the face.
His head was later used to trick Unit 09 into opening the station doors to let the surviving clone troopers back in.
